name: Asteroids Game Audio Demo
description:
How To Play

Keyboard:

  • Use arrow keys or WASD to rotate your ship
  • Use the space bar to impulse your ship
  • Use the Left Click / Left CTLR key to fire

Game made by Raúl Ibarra Aranda. 
Music and sound effects made by www.soundxp.net. 
Sprite Assets by Kenney

  •  https://www.kenney.nl/assets/space-shooter-redux
